search_results.snippet: Bla Viktor Jnos Bartk (/brtk/; Hungarian pronunciation: [bel brtok]; 25 March 1881  26 September 1945) was a Hungarian composer and pianist. He is considered one of the most important composers of the 20th century; he and Liszt are regarded as Hungary's greatest composers (Gillies 2001).
